summary: The diff primarily adds frontend UI/utilities to display a “Live Deployment Status” section (including generation/copying of an ic0.app link and refetching build metadata). It does not contain evidence of actually publishing/deploying Version 163 to the Live (public) canister.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish/deploy the current draft build (Version 163) to the Live (public) canister so the application is accessible via the public ICP gateway URL (https://<canister-id>.ic0.app), not only via the draft/preview origin.
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment/publish mechanism or configuration change is shown in the diff; backend file even indicates no code changes are needed and suggests manual deployment. The changes are limited to UI/status display and link generation utilities, which do not perform a publish to the live canister.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new Admin Settings UI sections/components for live publish verification (LivePublishStatus, GoLiveHelp) rather than only performing a publish/deploy action.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 is about publishing/deploying Version 163 to the live canister; the diff implements new UI for status/verification instead of (or in addition to) deployment. This is not explicitly requested and risks being considered new UI scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced new ICP link utility helpers to infer canister ID from hostname/storage/env and generate a public ic0.app link, plus clipboard helper.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested explicitly; REQ-1 only requires the Public ICP Link be available and correct after publish, not the addition of heuristic canister-id resolution logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Broader unrelated frontend feature additions/changes (wallet manager/provider, header/footer changes, lobby/tournament placeholders, styling changes, playable game UI, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest Non-goals explicitly say not to add new gameplay, wallet, admin, or UI features as part of this request; the diff summary indicates multiple such changes.
